name: Auto gunny
short_description:
This is a revised project reference from a project on the internet, the idea is to use opencv to analyze images taken from the game and get the parameters, based on the formula to give hints to players. but the project stopped because there is a better way, which is to use the source code of flash game processing is shared across the network, analyze the components and retrieve data directly. Impacts on the flash file, no need to take pictures from the outside as in this project,
Although unsuccessful, but the project is a good example for studying opencv.
